body.p: To His Excellency B MaGoffin Govr. of Ky
Your Petitioner Robert Henderson represents that on the 30th day of Decr 1861 he was fined fifty dollars by the Frankfort Police court for carry a concealed weapon.

He States that he intended no special injury to any person: that knowing that so many other persons in and around Frankfort went armed he was induced to do the same thing He is unable to pay this fine and he prays that your Excellency will remit it
Decr 31. 1861
The undersigned Citizens of Franklin County Concur in their prayer

Jno Rodman
Eugene P. Moore.
J. L. Phythian
T. B. Ford.
H Wingate
Ewd H Taylor
Jno. N. Crutcher
A Conery
James M Todd
